Name: Actor action
Notes: Actor-stayInLocation: Actor does not move from current location, nor perform any pro/antisocial behaviors; Actor-moveTo-Region01: Return home; Actor-join-Group: None; Actor-takeResources-Region01: Perform antisocial behaviors that gain resources personally at the expense of people in a given region; Actor-decreaseRisk-Region01: Perform prosocial behaviors to reduce the danger posed by the hurricane in a given region; Actor-leave-Group: None; Actor-evacuate: Evacuate the city at least temporarily; Actor-moveTo-shelter1: Move myself and family to the shelter in Region01

Name: Actor __REWARD__
Notes: Reward for Actor in this state

Name: Actor childrenHealth
Notes: Current level of children's physical wellbeing

Name: Actor grievance
Notes: Current level of grievance felt toward system

Name: Actor risk
Notes: Current level of risk from hurricane

Name: Group action
Notes: Group-evacuate: None; Group-decreaseRisk: None; Group-noDecision: None; Group-returnHome: None; Group-takeResources: None

Name: Group __REWARD__
Notes: Reward for Group in this state

Name: Region security
Notes: Level of law enforcement in region

Name: System __REWARD__
Notes: Reward for System in this state

Name: ActorRewardWeightOfchildrenHealth
LongName: Priority of childrenHealth to Actor in reward function

Name: ActorRewardWeightOfpet
LongName: Priority of pet to Actor in reward function

LongName: Priority of health to Actor in reward function

Name: ActorRewardWeightOffriends
LongName: Priority of friends to Actor in reward function

Name: ActorHorizon
LongName: Lookahead Horizon for Actor's Expected Reward
Notes: Actor level. Number of days into the future that the actor looks when evaluating candidate behaviors
